abstract: United States Central Command officials report US has killed 119 civilians in Iraq and Syria since military operations commenced against Islamic State group in 2014.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Details Civilian Deaths It’s Caused in Iraq and Syria
headline.main: U.S. Says It Has Killed 119 Civilians in Iraq and Syria Since 2014

snippet: In each case, officials said, the American military followed the proper procedures and did not violate laws of armed conflict....
lead_paragraph: In each case, officials said, the American military followed the proper procedures and did not violate laws of armed conflict.
